Must call initialize() on a SlideoutMenuActivity from within the onCreate of it\'s children
I hope you like the app. If you have any questions, comment, or problems - feel free to email me. \n\nIf you get value out of this app, I would appreciate if you could give something back.

- If you need an Android or Clojure dev, hire me!
- Donate through the in-app-purchase link below, or anytime on the About page.
- Contribute new features or bug fixes on Github; it’s open-source.
- Use the app, learn from the source code, share it with someone else; that’s what I made it for!

I\’ve put a lot of effort into making this a great app. If you\’d like, you can use an in-app purchase to donate some money to me.

It doesn\’t unlock any new features, other than my thanks (the whole app is open-sourced anyway). But if you are getting value out of it and want to give something back, you can select an amount below. You\’ll be sent to the Google Play store where you can confirm the amount & transaction in your local currency.

Thanks,
Matthew Bishop
Aka me, Matt Bishop.\n\nI design and code Android apps. Email me if you have any questions, comments, if you need someone to build an app for you, or are looking to hire a developer.
